thread.title: Wayfair's Bay Isle Home Boho-Style Floor Lamp Is a Must-Have
thread.title_full: Wayfair's Bay Isle Home Boho-Style Floor Lamp Is a Must-Have

author: Brittany Gibson
title: Wayfair's Bay Isle Home Boho-Style Floor Lamp Is a Must-Have
text:
Some home accents do more than serve a purpose — they change the whole feel of a room. That’s what shoppers are saying about the Bay Isle Home Arched Bohemian-Style Floor Lamp, a piece that mixes style with function and is now on sale for as low as $80 at Wayfair, down from its original price of $180.
The lamp is available in two finishes — matte black and gold — and showcases a woven rattan shade layered over linen, which gives it a soft, diffused glow that feels warm and inviting. The arched silhouette adds height, making it easy to fill an empty corner and instantly tie a room together. It also measures over five feet tall, so it doesn’t disappear into the background.
Bay Isle Home Arched Bohemian-Style Floor Lamp, From $80 (was $180) at Wayfair
Shoppers were quick to point out the fact that it’s as practical as it is pretty. The lamp includes two removable lampshades, a dimmable bulb, a convenient foot switch, and a remote that attaches magnetically to the base so it’s always easy to find.
The light can shift between four tones — from a golden evening glow to bright daylight — and the brightness slides anywhere from a subtle 5 to 100 percent shine. For those who like flexibility, both the pole and shade adjust to direct light where it’s needed most.
One shopper said they “absolutely love these floor lamps! They are gorgeous, and the different lighting settings are amazing!” Another called it “beautiful” and added that it’s “one of the best purchases so far.” Others mention how much character it brings to their space, describing it as the “perfect addition” and “really a lovely element to the room.”
Wayfair Has a 'Stylish' and 'Sturdy' Bookcase with 'Ample Storage' on Sale for $55
Choose from seven classic colors.
Bianca Pineda
0With natural textures, customizable light, and plenty of praise from shoppers who say it looks far more expensive than it is, the Bay Isle Home Arched Bohemian-Style Floor Lamp is the type of find that transforms a room in one step.
For as low as $80, this deal likely won’t last long. Be sure to snag your own now while it’s still marked down this low at Wayfair.
